mapper.select: SELECT `commit`.uuid, `commit`.repo_id, `commit`.commit_id, `commit`.commit_time from ce_scan_status INNER JOIN `commit` ON ce_scan_status.repo_id=`commit`.repo_id AND ce_scan_status.commit_id=`commit`.commit_id WHERE ce_scan_status.`status`='Scanned' AND ce_scan_status.repo_id=#{repoId} ORDER BY commit_time
select uuid, repo_id, commit_id, commit_time from scan where repo_id=#{repo_id} and commit_time between #{since} and #{until} order by commit_time
